# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously crafted to provide exceptional value and quality. This item is truly a testament to excellence and we believe it could significantly enhance your experience or needs. Considering its unparalleled features and craftsmanship, I'm extending an exclusive offer to you. For a limited time, you can purchase this remarkable product for $145. Don't miss out on this opportunity to elevate your life with our top-tier solution. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $145. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $145
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $100
